summary: A woman goes to prison for murder. After being released back into society, she tries to create a new life for her and her now nine year old daughter. But her dark past comes back to haunt her and threaten both of their lives.
cast: Silje Salomonsen|Tomas Alf Larsen|Egil Birkeland|Vegar Hoel|Fredrik S. Hana|Ole Romsdal|Iben Østin Hjelle|Kjell Breivik|Tore Reidarsønn Kvam|Lene Heimlund Larsen|Kjersti Østin Ommundsen|Thomas Skjørestad|Terje Torkildsen
title: Eventyrland
